summary: An FBI administrative form documenting a walk-in complaint from Mark L. Epstein requesting information on the investigation into his brother's homicide. The document is classified as an administrative matter and appears to be a record of a public inquiry.

persons.name: Mark L Epstein
persons.context: Individual who walked into the FBI's New York Operations Command to request information about the investigation into his brother's homicide.

events.title: Walk-in complaint to FBI
events.description: Mark L. Epstein walked into the FBI's New York Operations Command to request information on the investigation of his brother's homicide.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein filed a walk-in complaint with the FBI on October 9, 2019, regarding his brother's homicide investigation.
The document is an FBI administrative form recording a public inquiry, classified as UNCLASSIFIED.
The case is categorized under 'Walk_InComplaints' and 'ADMINISTRATIVE MATTERS'.
The document suggests an ongoing homicide investigation related to Mark L. Epstein's brother.
